commit_message:
Merge pull request #8 from shenlab-sinai/develop_edd

Reorganization in Eddie's develop branch was completed in 2015, merging into master branch 24 Apr 2017.
remove memory setting for samtools sort
modify README
modify README
modify README
update flowchart
move makedir to a separate execution script so that errors from existing directories do not break the pipeline
remove unused files
revamp local processing script files to align with script-lsf files
cleanup python.py file
add paired end alignment parsing, plus misc cleanup
add new config settings to determine uniqmapped, multimapped and unmapped reads.
add job completion comment to output to log file
amend result_parser.py regex for phantompeak.log to recognize negative values
add mapq and AS-XS cutoff option for splitting reads into unique and multi-mapped. amended results_parser.py to work after the changes
add setting for diffrepeat edit distance
modify fastqc to run from initial fastq files rather than bam files as bam files are now split among unmapped, uniquemapped and multimapped
Split alignments into uniquemapped, multimapped and unmapped bam files. Add diffRepeats analysis on unmapped and multimapped sequences. Reorganized the output directory structure and file locations
add diffRepeats analysis to pipeline
add repbase_db variable to config.yaml
correct error, we want to combine un and multimapped, NOT uniq and multimapped
merge uniq and multi-mapped bam files and generate fastq
add feature to split output alignment into unique-, multi-, and un-mapped bam files, first for bowtie2 single-end alignments

Merge pull request #7 from ny-shao/master

Update support for SGE, now the log file is normal.
Update support for SGE, now the log file is normal.

Add SGE support.
Update of README.
SGE support is added.

Merge pull request #5 from ny-shao/master

Fix a bug in alignment of pair end data.

Fix a bug in pair end data.

Fix a bug in alignment of pair end data.
Merge changes from https://github.com/shenlab-sinai/chip-seq_preprocess.

Remove unnecessary sorting in rmdup step (Fixes #3).

After rmdup, bam files are already sorted. Sorting is a waste of
resource. The rmdup bam files are also renamed by adding '_rmdup'
to make their names more informative.

Enhance LSF cluster script and configuration.

The following changes have been made:
  1. Made running partition an optional argument (let the cluster decide).
  2. Added allocation option.
  3. Defined cluster options as a function in pipeline.py.
  4. Added some missing configuration to LSF config.yaml.

Add a script to automatically configure the environment for pipeline
running on Minerva.

Correct the mis-understanding of the multithread option in ruffus (Fixes #2).

Since multithread determines the number of jobs to be submitted to
cluster nodes, we can simply set it to a reasonably large number and
leave it as is. Both Readme.md and pipeline.py are modified.
Update README.md
Skip the ngs.plot of pair bam plotting if there is no DNA input data.
Fix the issue of timestamp. Now the files could be tracked and updated after running.
Update pipeline.py to the default step of runNgsplotAll.
Fix a bug for alignment of single end data.
Fix a bug for alignment of single end data.
Add support to LSF cluter.
